titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I wrote two letters to America answering President Richmond & M
Zabriskie. Also I wrote to Gamble telling him the time for peace–making essays was not yet. I changed a cheque for £40, and walked Logic round Houghall Wood. I attended Evensong in the Cathedral.
